product_name: Gregory Pace D1.5 Hydration Waistpack - Women's
long_description: The Gregrory Pace D1.5 Hydration waistpack offers quick access to hydration, and is optimally situated in the lumbar area for stability and balance when running. Fluid Mechanics design means the shape of the waistpack allows you to carry essentials while maintaining a natural stride and arm swing while running. Hydrapak(R) DualBot 24 fl. oz. water bottle features a sport top for quick hydration. Water bottle pocket accommodates most bottles up to 24 fl. oz.; bottle is situated diagonally for effortless access while on the move. Dual stretch accessory pockets and twin zippered waistbelt pockets offer plenty of storage for small items like keys and energy snacks. Compression strap secures the fit. The Gregory Pace D1.5 hydration waistpack features reflective graphics for visibility in low light.
short_description: The Gregrory Pace D1.5 Hydration waistpack offers quick access to hydration, and is optimally situated in the lumbar area for stability and balance when running.
